ygData.subject: Re: Hot Rod/Epyon
ygData.msgSnippet: Firedrill was not sure what to do at the order to fall in. Obviously Cliffjumper disliked this leader, so he didnt want to get to attached, as he knew

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Firedrill was not sure what to do at the order to fall in. Obviously
Cliffjumper disliked this leader, so he didnt want to get to attached,
as he knew Cliffjumper well, and he had a certain know how to what
happens. After much thinking he decides to stay where he is, further
away from the crowd. He leans over against a wall, and keeps an eye on
what is happening.

Cliffjumper roared across the African terrain, thinking, blowing off
steam, and most importantly weighing his options. He was not sure what
to make of this situation, and even less sure if there were any groups
better than the Maximals. What has this universe come to, he asked
himself. He then noticed to strange robots (Klant, Torca). He quickly
stops and transforms, pulling out his pistol, and keeping quiet.
